div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1752 Hillah, c. 10 km. S of anc. Babylon, Babylonia, 1953 Burial: shortly before 310 B.C. Contents: 39+ AR Athens, oriental imit.: 17 tetradr. (3 of Mazaces) Babylon: 22 st. (lion) Disposition: Paris 8 Le Rider, SM 1972, pp. 4-7, illus.
